SEARCH
Package getumbrellad.models.exceptions

Class Character

java.lang.Object
getumbrellad.models.exceptions.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boss, Chaser, NPC, Player, Portal, Shooter
public abstract class Character extends Object
Represents an abstract class Character. Characters have position, hitbox, health, damage, and movement parameters. Subclasses include entities such as players, bosses, or enemies.

    • getDirectionalComponentOf

      public double getDirectionalComponentOf(int xMouse, int x, int yMouse, int y, boolean xComponent)
      Computes the component (x or y) of the direction vector from this character to the given mouse coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xMouse - the x-coordinate of the target
      x - the x-origin of the character
      yMouse - the y-coordinate of the target
      y - the y-origin of the character
      xComponent - true to compute x-component, false for y-component
      Returns:
      the directional component toward the target
